subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants signed two players yesterday and officially placed wide receiver Jamaar Taylor on the reserve/retired list. The Giants signed running back Decori Birmingham and guard Kevin McAlmont and waived offensive lineman Tony Tella, who was signed last month during the team's minicamp. Taylor spent two seasons with the Giants and caught six passes for 146 yards, all in 2004.
